Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the formatted message should be the verbose format, meaning it displays all fields of the .
Docs.value: true means all fields will be traced, false means only minimal information will be traced. The default value is false.

Docs.param: The associated with this trace. It may be null but the resulting trace will contain no correlation ID.
The category for the trace. This can be any user-defined value. It is not interpreted by this implementation but is written to the trace.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the to which the traces will be sent.
Docs.value: This property allows a custom to be used when writing the traces. This allows an application to configure and use its own other than the default . If the value is null, this trace writer will send traces to .
